articles.author: Stephen Collinson
articles.title: Trump and Johnson build alliance on the falsehood of the stolen election - CNN
articles.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson will stand Friday with Donald Trump at an appearance that will amplify the former president’s most damaging falsehood: that America’s democratic elections are catastrophically tainted by fraud.
